name: mail
description: Sets up a user-to-moderator mailing system for your guild

options.name: setup
options.description: Sets up a user-to-moderator mailing system for your guild

options.name: timeout
options.description: Duration (minutes) before the channel auto-archives due to inactivity

options.name: list
options.description: Shows a list of archived mail channels

options.name: view
options.description: Shows the contents of a mail archive
